heading.title: Get to know New Dental Choice

card.body_text:
At New Dental Choice, we’re here to help you save money on dental care – whether it’s basic or major.

We were established as a dental discount plan in 2001 by First Dental Health. And in 2012, we became part of the Principal® suite of dental programs when First Dental Health was purchased as a wholly owned subsidiary of Principal Financial Group®. We work with more than 100,000 dentist and specialist locations nationwide.

Please note: We currently do not offer New Dental Choice in Alaska, Hawaii, Maine, Montana, New Hampshire, Rhode Island, South Dakota, Vermont, Washington and Wyoming.

heading.title: Enjoy the advantages of quality, affordable dental care

subheading.title: New Dental Choice is for anyone at any age.
